remarks: Finite support of univariate polynomial coefficient vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ coe1sfi as of 19-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
coe1sfi.a $e |- A = ( coe1 ` F ) $.
coe1sfi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1sfi.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1sfi.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
coe1sfiOLD $p |- ( F e. B -> ( `' A " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
